mapper.select: select t2.id id,t1.content title from ts_language t1 left join tm_theme t2 on t1.uuid =t2.title where type=#{language} AND t2.`id` IS NOT NULL

-- select A.id id,title,description `desc`, -- photoOne,photoTwo,photoThree,photoFour -- from(select t2.id id,t1.content title from -- ts_language t1 left join tm_theme t2 on t1.uuid =t2.title where type=#{language}) A -- left join (select t2.id id,t1.content description, photo_one photoOne, photo_two photoTwo, -- photo_three photoThree,photo_four photoFour from ts_language t1 left join tm_theme t2 -- on t1.uuid =t2.title where type=#{language}) B on A.id=B.id where A.id=#{id}; SELECT a.id id, title, `desc`, photo_one photoOne, photo_two photoTwo, photo_three photoThree, photo_four photoFour from tm_theme a WHERE a.id=#{id}

select t2.id id,t3.image image,t1.content title from ts_language t1 left join tm_theme t2 on t1.uuid =t2.title left join tm_indexconfig t3 on t2.id=t3.itemId where t3.type='theme' and t1.type=#{language} order by t3.sort limit 0,6

SELECT t3.id tourId, t6.content title , t5.trd_price price, t4.image_url image FROM tm_theme t1 JOIN tm_tour_theme t2 ON t1.id=t2.thm_id JOIN tm_tour t3 ON t2.tour_id=t3.id JOIN tm_tour_image t4 ON t3.id=t4.tour_id LEFT JOIN (select min(trd_time),tour_id,trd_price from tm_tourdate where trd_time>#{day3} group by tour_id)t5 on t3.id=t5.tour_id LEFT JOIN ts_language t6 ON t3.title = t6.uuid WHERE t1.id=#{themeId} AND t4.thumbnail=1 AND t5.type=#{language} ORDER BY t3.id limit #{page},9
SELECT count(*) total FROM tm_theme t1 JOIN tm_tour_theme t2 ON t1.id=t2.thm_id JOIN tm_tour t3 on t2.tour_id=t3.id JOIN tm_tour_image t4 ON t3.id=t4.tour_id WHERE t1.id=#{themeId} AND t4.thumbnail=1
